USA: The Province of Georgia overturned its ban on slavery
Haiti: The city of Port-au-Prince was founded by Charles Burnier, Marquis of Larnage and named the capital of Saint-Domingue.
Germany: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe was born.
Colombia: José Alfonso Pizarro is Viceroy of New Granada
Chile: A fort and prison is established on Robinson Crusoe Island of Juan Fernández Archipelago.
Cambodia: The Vietnamese conquered the Mekong Delta.
